suite.name: Login Test
suite.source: D:\University Work\Year 4, Term 1\Advanced Software Testing (Naruephon)\Task\Task 1 robot framework (github)\login_test.robot

test.name: TC 1.0.001 ทดสอบการเข้าสู่ระบบและตรวจสอบสิทธิ

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//button[text()="ออกจากระบบ"]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'ออกจากระบบ'.
kw.arg: ออกจากระบบ
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: ทดสอบการเข้าสู่ระบบด้วยข้อมูลที่ถูกต้องและตรวจสอบสิทธิ

test.name: TC 1.0.002 ทดสอบการเข้าสู่ระบบเมื่อกรอก E-mail หรือ Username ผิด

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'คุณกรอก E-mail ไม่ถูกต้อง'.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: ทดสอบการเข้าสู่ระบบด้วย E-mail หรือ Username ที่ผิด

test.name: TC 1.0.004 ทดสอบการเข้าสู่ระบบโดยไม่กรอกข้อมูล

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
